alert.note: Alert for Bullitt; Jefferson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 2:24PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jefferson and northwestern Bullitt Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Valley Station, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fairdale around 230 PM EDT. Hollyvilla around 235 PM EDT. South Park View and Okolona around 240 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Pioneer Village, Newburg, Spring Mill, Buechel, Minor Lane Heights and Highview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
